channel.title: apache-superset on Mark Needham

item.title: Apache Superset: Refusing to start due to insecure SECRET_KEY
item.description: I’ve been trying to install Apache Superset so that I can use it for a demo and ran into an issue with a secret key when trying to install it. In this blog post, I’ll explain how to work around it. We’re going to be using Poetry and will follow the installing from scratch guide. First up is installing the library: poetry add apache-superset And then after initialising the database with poetry run superset db upgrade, we’ll try to create the admin user:
